resources.title: JoJo Stat Roller
resources.desc: Easily roll and calculate character and Stand stats. Created by Kyler Froman.

resources.title: 5e-Style Sheets
resources.desc: 5e-style character sheets for JoJo D&D. Created by karltonmarx.

resources.title: Mage's Bizarre Revamp
resources.desc: Changes and new additions to give more options for PCs and DMs. Created by Mage.

resources.title: Fill-In Google Sheets
resources.desc: Character sheet in Google Docs, make a copy of the sheet and you're ready to fill in everything. Created by Dandy Silver Fox.

resources.title: Act 4 Stands Homebrew
resources.desc: A simple homebrew allowing for a 4th evolution for Act-Type Stands. Created by Odd_Coconut.

resources.title: JoJo D&D Baseball
resources.desc: A homebrew to play JoJo-themed baseball within the JoJo D&D module. Created by sandman.

resources.title: sandman's DM Screen
resources.desc: A virtual DM Screen with quick references to necessary information. Created by sandman.

resources.title: sandman's Tracker
resources.desc: A handy page to keep track of all sorts of things in-session like HP, Abilities, Energy, and more. Created by sandman.

resources.title: Bare Bones Sheets
resources.desc: A bare-bones version of the character sheets. Created by sandman.

resources.title: The Chained
resources.desc: A Stand Typing designed for villians, antagonists, and more evil characters. Created by Sammick.

resources.title: The Ballista
resources.desc: A Stand Typing that is physically powerful with long range, but also a bit more fragile and slower. Created by Sammick.

resources.title: Level Helper
resources.desc: A table of level based stuff like Proficiency Bonuses, Ability Dice, and more. Created by Sammick.

resources.title: Moon Ripple
resources.desc: A way to use Ripple as Undead without ending up like Straizo. Created by mimi.

resources.title: The Moonwalk
resources.desc: A martial art that allows a user to manipulate their own center of gravity in amazing ways. Created by Vesper_Tera.

resources.title: Phenomenon Type
resources.desc: A Stand Typing that lacks an apparition in exchange for more enhanced abilities. Created by sandman.

resources.title: More Class-Based Feats
resources.desc: A document that adds more Feats for specific Stand types and Classes. Created by sandman.

resources.title: Fodder Undead System
resources.desc: A faster way to make lesser undead for hack and slash style encounters. Created by sandman.

resources.title: The Powerhouse
resources.desc: A stand built to be physically unstoppable at the cost of nearly no development potential. Created by Sammick.

resources.title: The Gorgon
resources.desc: A solution to the mystery of what if Rock Humans were vampires? Created by Huggable Muffin.

resources.title: Tabletop Sim Sheet
resources.desc: A digital version of the JoJo D&D character sheet for use in Tabeltop Simulator. Created by Bruhlow.

resources.title: Alternate Evolutions
resources.desc: Alternate Stand Evolutions for Stands to grow in ways beyond the standard ways. Created by Sammick.

resources.title: Form Shift Stand
resources.desc: A Feat for Stands that can switch between multiple different forms rather than being bound to one. Created by Sammick.

resources.title: Fodder Stand Users
resources.desc: Pre-made stat blocks for lesser, unimportant stand users. Created by SlickNinja125.

resources.desc: Want your work featured here? Reach out to Kyler (Xenotater) through our Community Discord.
